import React from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { addUsers } from '../actions'; import store from "../store" import { validation } from './validation'; export const SignupForm = ({}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( { dispatch(addUsers(values)); actions.setSubmitting(false); actions.resetForm(); console.log(store.getState()); }} >
); };
